Class GridMenu<T>

java.lang.Object
net.tangly.ui.components.GridMenu<T>
Type Parameters:
T - type of the items in the grid
public class GridMenu<T> extends Object
Defines a grid menu abstraction to support a dynamic context menu in item views. Menu items can be enabled or disabled based on the fact if items are selected or not.

    • add

      public void add(@NotNull @NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.Component component)
      Adds a component to the context menu. Mainly used to add a separator.
      Parameters:
      component - component to add to the context menu

    • buildCrudMenu

      public void buildCrudMenu(@NotNull @NotNull Mode mode, @NotNull @NotNull ItemView<T> view)
      Creates the standard CRUD menu for an item view. The menu is built based on the mode of the grid.
      Parameters:
      mode - mode of the grid
      view - view owning the grid and the associated grid context menu.
